sentences.en: ...an admirer of Arthur Jafa's breathtaking cinematography.
sentences.cn: ...亚瑟·贾法怦然心动电影技巧的一位崇拜者。

sentences.en: Danny Boyle who just did Slumdog Millionaire, an incredible film, the cinematography is amazing.
sentences.cn: 执导了《贫民富翁》的丹尼·伯夷, 那是一部极妙的电影, 电影艺术惊人.

sentences.en: Peugeot invites you for a tour of French cinematography.
sentences.cn: 标致邀请您参观的法国电影.

sentences.en: The art direction, cinematography, and lighting stand out especially.
sentences.cn: 此片的美术及摄影, 灯光尤其特出.

sentences.en: The cinematography beautifully translates into three dimensions , whisking audiences into the world of ancient Egypt.
sentences.cn: 高超的电影技术美妙地转变成3D图像, 把观众带到古老的埃及.

sentences.en: The intensity of a moment can be increased with cinematography and editing, not just with performance.
sentences.cn: 强度的时刻,可以增加与摄影和编辑, 而不只是与表现.

sentences.en: There is cutting edge cinematography and state - of - the - art technology.
sentences.cn: 英国的电影技术和电影科技世界领先.

words.tran_cn: 电影；电影院；电影业，电影制作术
放映技师；电影摄影技师

trans.tran_en: the skill or study of making films
